name: Digital Journal Google Sheet
description: A thoughtfully designed journaling solution inside Google Sheets that helps you track your daily reflections, moods, and progress toward your goals. Whether you’re managing your emotions, building habits, or keeping a personal log, this template becomes your daily mental companion.

sections.title: Daily Journal Entries
sections.text: Capture your thoughts, events, or reflections in a structured daily entry format. Assign tags or emojis to highlight the nature of each entry—from joyful to stressful, or anything in between.
sections.htmlText: Capture your thoughts, events, or reflections in a structured daily entry format. Assign tags or emojis to highlight the nature of each entry—from joyful to stressful, or anything in between.

sections.title: Goal Setting and Completion
sections.text: Every morning, define your top goal for the day. At day's end, mark it as completed or deferred. A simple structure to promote intentional living and habit-building.
